OnlyLive.label: Only when stream is live
OnlyLive.tooltip: If enabled the command will only work while stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Cost.label: Cost
Cost.tooltip: Base cost on using the command

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

Died.value: {0} pulls the trigger and .... BOOMB {0} died!
Died.label: Death response
Died.tooltip:
Message sent when user get shot 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = command cost 
 {2} = currency name 
 {3} = value currency lost  
 {4} = timeout length

Survived.value: {0} pulls the trigger and .... BOOMB! nothing happens and {0} lives!
Survived.label: Survive response
Survived.tooltip:
Message sent when user survives 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = command cost 
 {2} = currency name 
 {3} = value currency gained

NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points! 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currency name 
 {2} = command name 
 {3} = command cost

PermissionResp.value: $user -> only $permission ($permissioninfo) and higher can use this command
PermissionResp.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResp.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

Bullets.label: Chambers loaded
Bullets.tooltip: Amount of chambers that are loaded

TimeoutLength.label: Timeout length
TimeoutLength.tooltip: Timeout length in seconds when shot!

RCurrencyMin.label: Min currency loss
RCurrencyMin.tooltip: Minimum value to lose when shot

RCurrencyMax.label: Max currency loss
RCurrencyMax.tooltip: Maximum value to lose when shot

ACurrencyMin.label: Min currency gain
ACurrencyMin.tooltip: Minimum value to win when surviving

ACurrencyMax.label: Max currency gain
ACurrencyMax.tooltip: Maximum value to win when surviving

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
